desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> to activate:
desc.1: Perform up to 4 attacks forward, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct> for the first two hits and <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct> for the third and fourth hits.
desc.2: When attacked between the retreat of the 3rd hit to before the 4th hit, triggers an automatic dodge.

desc.0: After the 4th hit of a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</ct>, or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up</ct>, hold or press <IconNormal /> to activate:
desc.1: Summon the mech to perform a charged punch attack, dealing massive <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.
desc.2: When <ct color=#FFFFFF>Steel Charge</ct> reaches 120, gain one chance to quickly activate <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Falling Petals - Slaughter</ct> by holding <IconNormal />. This effect expires when <ct color=#FFFFFF>Steel Charge</ct> is less than 120 or after using the method above to activate <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Falling Petals - Slaughter</ct> once.
desc.3: Does not accumulate <ct color=#FFFFFF>Steel Charge</ct> on hit.
desc.4: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: Seed has <ct color=#FFFFFF>Steel Charge</ct>, which she can accumulate by hitting enemies with her skills.
desc.1: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Steel Charge</ct> has a maximum value of 150, and an initial value of 60. Upon reaching 120 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Steel Charge</ct> and triggering <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Falling Petals - Slaughter</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate: Clockwork Garden - Bloom!</ct>, press or hold <IconNormal /> to consume 60 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Steel Charge</ct> and unleash <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Falling Petals - Downfall First Form</ct>, then automatically consume 60 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Steel Charge</ct> to follow up with <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Falling Petals - Downfall Second Form</ct>.
desc.2: Pilots the mech to fire sweeping shots and perform a jumping smash, dealing massive <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.
desc.3: Does not accumulate <ct color=#FFFFFF>Steel Charge</ct> on hit.
desc.4: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

BasicAttackFallingPetalsDownfallFirstFor.name: Basic Attack: Falling Petals - Downfall First Form

BasicAttackFallingPetalsDownfallSecondFo.name: Basic Attack: Falling Petals - Downfall Second Form

desc.0: Press <IconEvade /> to activate:
desc.1: A quick dash dodge.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> during a dodge to activate:
desc.1: Throw steel wheels forward, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> during a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</ct> to activate:
desc.1: Unleash a barrage of lasers at enemies in front, dealing <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: Press <IconSpecial /> to activate:
desc.1: Throw a steel wheel that traces a curved path, dealing <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.

EXSpecialAttackRainingIronPetals.name: EX Special Attack: Raining Iron Petals

desc.0: With enough Energy, press <IconSpecialReady /> to activate:
desc.1: Enter flight mode, where Seed can move in four directions, and unleash a continuous barrage of missiles, dealing massive <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Hold <IconSpecialReady /> to extend the barrage duration while continuously consuming Energy.
desc.3: During flight, release <IconSpecialReady /> to trigger <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Raining Iron Petals - Away</ct>.
desc.4: Upon consuming 60 Energy points in one flight, automatically trigger <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Falling Petals - Slaughter</ct>.
desc.5: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

EXSpecialAttackRainingIronPetalsAway.name: EX Special Attack: Raining Iron Petals - Away

desc.0: During <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Raining Iron Petals</ct>, release <IconSpecialReady /> to activate:
desc.1: Unleash rapid cannon fire, dealing <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Does not accumulate <ct color=#FFFFFF>Steel Charge</ct> on hit.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

ChainAttackTempestOfFrostyPetals.name: Chain Attack: Tempest of Frosty Petals

desc.0: When a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> is triggered, select the character to activate:
desc.1: Summons her mech for protection, then launches cannon shots and a barrage of missiles, dealing massive <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When Decibel Rating is at <ct color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</ct>, press <IconUltimateReady /> to activate:
desc.1: Seed will pilot the mech personally, raining down missiles and a meteor shower of rockets, then performing a jumping smash, dealing massive <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.
desc.2: After using this skill, accumulate 60 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Steel Charge</ct>.
desc.3: Does not accumulate <ct color=#FFFFFF>Steel Charge</ct> on hit.
desc.4: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

QuickAssistBarrageOfRainingFlowers.name: Quick Assist: Barrage of Raining Flowers

desc.0: When the active character is launched, press <IconSwitch /> to activate:
desc.1: Unleash a barrage of lasers at enemies in front, dealing <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When the on-field character is about to be attacked, press <IconSwitch /> to activate:
desc.1: Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> after a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</ct> to activate:
desc.1: Unleash continuous floating turret attacks at enemies ahead, dealing <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: The <ct color=#FFFFFF>Attack</ct> teammate with the highest initial ATK is considered Seed's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Vanguard</ct>.
desc.1: When the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Vanguard</ct> unleashes an <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, Seed gains <ct color=#FFFFFF>Onslaught</ct> status, increasing Seed's ATK by <ct color=#2BAD00>100</ct> and CRIT DMG by <ct color=#2BAD00>15%</ct>. When Seed unleashes an <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Vanguard</ct> gains <ct color=#FFFFFF>Direct Strike</ct> status, increasing the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Vanguard</ct>'s ATK by <ct color=#2BAD00>100</ct> and CRIT DMG by <ct color=#2BAD00>15%</ct>.
desc.2: When <ct color=#FFFFFF>Direct Strike</ct> and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Onslaught</ct> are both active, Seed and the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Vanguard</ct> simultaneously gain <ct color=#FFFFFF>Besiege</ct> status, increasing DMG dealt by <ct color=#2BAD00>12.5%</ct>.
desc.3: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Onslaught</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Direct Strike</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Besiege</ct> buffs can all take effect when the character is the current active character. When switching to inactive, the buffs remain until the character goes off-field or 3s after the switch. When the character returns to being the active character, the buffs re-activate.
desc.4: Upon entering the battlefield with a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Vanguard</ct>, Seed immediately gains <ct color=#FFFFFF>Onslaught</ct> status and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Besiege</ct> status, while the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Vanguard</ct> immediately gains <ct color=#FFFFFF>Direct Strike</ct> status and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Besiege</ct> status.
desc.5: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Direct Strike</ct> and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Onslaught</ct> status last for 40s, and repeated triggers refresh the duration.
desc.6: When the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Vanguard</ct> consumes Energy as the active character or when Seed consumes Energy, for every 1 point of Energy consumed, Seed recovers 0.5 points of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Steel Charge</ct>.

desc.0: The <ct color=#FFFFFF>Attack</ct> teammate with the highest initial ATK is considered Seed's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Vanguard</ct>.
desc.1: When the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Vanguard</ct> unleashes an <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, Seed gains <ct color=#FFFFFF>Onslaught</ct> status, increasing Seed's ATK by <ct color=#2BAD00>225</ct> and CRIT DMG by <ct color=#2BAD00>17.5%</ct>. When Seed unleashes an <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Vanguard</ct> gains <ct color=#FFFFFF>Direct Strike</ct> status, increasing the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Vanguard</ct>'s ATK by <ct color=#2BAD00>225</ct> and CRIT DMG by <ct color=#2BAD00>17.5%</ct>.
desc.2: When <ct color=#FFFFFF>Direct Strike</ct> and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Onslaught</ct> are both active, Seed and the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Vanguard</ct> simultaneously gain <ct color=#FFFFFF>Besiege</ct> status, increasing DMG dealt by <ct color=#2BAD00>14.5%</ct>.
desc.3: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Onslaught</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Direct Strike</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Besiege</ct> buffs can all take effect when the character is the current active character. When switching to inactive, the buffs remain until the character goes off-field or 3s after the switch. When the character returns to being the active character, the buffs re-activate.
desc.4: Upon entering the battlefield with a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Vanguard</ct>, Seed immediately gains <ct color=#FFFFFF>Onslaught</ct> status and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Besiege</ct> status, while the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Vanguard</ct> immediately gains <ct color=#FFFFFF>Direct Strike</ct> status and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Besiege</ct> status.
desc.5: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Direct Strike</ct> and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Onslaught</ct> status last for 40s, and repeated triggers refresh the duration.
desc.6: When the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Vanguard</ct> consumes Energy as the active character or when Seed consumes Energy, for every 1 point of Energy consumed, Seed recovers 0.5 points of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Steel Charge</ct>.

desc.1: When the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Vanguard</ct> unleashes an <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, Seed gains <ct color=#FFFFFF>Onslaught</ct> status, increasing Seed's ATK by <ct color=#2BAD00>350</ct> and CRIT DMG by <ct color=#2BAD00>20%</ct>. When Seed unleashes an <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Vanguard</ct> gains <ct color=#FFFFFF>Direct Strike</ct> status, increasing the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Vanguard</ct>'s ATK by <ct color=#2BAD00>350</ct> and CRIT DMG by <ct color=#2BAD00>20%</ct>.

When Seed unleashes an <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Vanguard</ct> gains <ct color=#FFFFFF>Direct Strike</ct> status, increasing the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Vanguard</ct>'s ATK by <ct color=#2BAD00>1,000</ct> and CRIT DMG by <ct color=#2BAD00>30%</ct>.

When switching to inactive, the buffs remain until the character goes off-field or 3s after the switch. When the character returns to being the active character, the buffs re-activate.

desc.5: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Direct Strike</ct> and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Onslaught</ct> status last for 40s, and repeated triggers refresh the duration.
desc.6: When the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Vanguard</ct> consumes Energy as the active character or when Seed consumes Energy, for every 1 point of Energy consumed, Seed recovers 0.5 points of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Steel Charge</ct>.

desc.0: When another <ct color=#FFFFFF>Attack</ct> Character is in your squad:
desc.1: When Seed deals DMG as the active character, restore 2 Energy to the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Vanguard</ct>. This effect can trigger once every 1s.
desc.2: Seed's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Falling Petals - Slaughter</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Falling Petals - Downfall</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate: Clockwork Garden - Bloom!</ct> deal 30% increased DMG and ignore 25% of enemy <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric RES</ct>.

1.name: "Hibernation Period"
1.desc: When Seed's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Steel Charge</ct> reaches 100, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Falling Petals - Downfall</ct> can be triggered, and the total <ct color=#FFFFFF>Steel Charge</ct> consumed is reduced to 100. The amount of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Steel Charge</ct> required to gain one chance to quickly release <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Falling Petals - Slaughter</ct> is reduced to 100. Accumulate an additional 40/20 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Steel Charge</ct> when entering the battlefield/using <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</ct>. Increases <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Falling Petals - Downfall</ct> CRIT DMG by 30%.

flavor.0: This is a solemn and mysterious building, isolated from the outside world.
flavor.1: The pure white one belongs here. She shrinks back, carefully peering out through the wire fence. What's the world outside like?
flavor.2: Her curiosity flows beyond the sterile room, past the crumbling towers, dodging the pink giant flowers in the sky.
flavor.4: "Looks just like a cracked, stinky egg~"
flavor.5: "But I want to experience it for a while..."

2.name: "Light Absorption Technique"
2.desc: When <ct color=#FFFFFF>Besiege</ct> is active for an Agent, that Agent's DMG ignores 20% of DEF. When activating <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Raining Iron Petals</ct>, after consuming a total of 60 Energy, Seed can continue consuming Energy to extend the duration of the skill until the button is released or a total of 120 Energy is consumed. For every 5 Energy consumed by <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Raining Iron Petals</ct>, the following <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Falling Petals - Slaughter</ct>'s DMG increases by 5%.

flavor.0: This is a sprawling ruin of twisted steel.
flavor.1: An inexplicable, indescribable emotion chokes her throat, yet her tongue remains silent...
flavor.2: Her vision blurs as some alien liquid trickles down her cheeks.
flavor.4: What is this blinding thing clumsily drawing closer?
flavor.5: "Don't be afraid... I'm here... to save you..."
flavor.6: "Do you have... a name? My codename is... 'Seed.'"

3.name: "A Story of Sprouting"
3.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2

flavor.0: This is just another break room in a military camp.
flavor.1: They greeted her, trying to open her heart.
flavor.2: A shy redheaded young lady, a strange chatty gun barrel, a golden retriever with an eye cover...
flavor.3: The big robot told her that they were all her friends.
flavor.5: "Friends... they're the ones you see when you look behind you."

4.name: "Fragrant Tune"
4.desc: When Seed's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Besiege</ct> status buff is active, her Decibel Generation Rate increases by 10%, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</ct> DMG increases by 20%.

flavor.0: This is a grand, bustling plaza.
flavor.1: On a stage towering above everyone else, someone is muttering something.
flavor.2: A voice calls out her name, and many people crowd around. The dazed flower is transplanted onto the stage, gunpowder still fresh in her hair.
flavor.3: The black box flickers with light brighter than stars, and small metal patches are pinned onto both the older and the younger one, both equally at a loss for what to do.
flavor.4: This recognition also means that from this moment on, she is "Seed," and the robot that has always been by her side is now "Seed Sr."
flavor.6: "Of course, you're our pride... this codename is proof of that, Seed."

5.name: "Time to Bloom"
5.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2

flavor.0: This is a tiny safe house that almost no one knows about.
flavor.1: The entire space is filled with scattered, miscellaneous items. Boxes, sofas, picture frames, and pots upon pots of flowers — red ones, yellow ones, pink ones, some standing straight, some fluffy, some drooping.
flavor.2: Close your eyes, cover your mouth, you'll hold it in for sure — she promised.
flavor.3: "Give them a little more time, okay?"
flavor.4: "They'll grow up beautifully... just like you."

desc.0: Seed's CRIT DMG increases by 50%.
desc.1: When using <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Falling Petals - Slaughter</ct>, fires 3 additional laser beams, each dealing 165% of ATK as DMG. This effect can trigger once every 3s.

flavor.0: Here lies a vast sea of flowers, blooming wild and brilliant.
flavor.1: She remembers how this place once looked — barren, without even a single blade of grass.
flavor.2: Who could have done such mischief? Who transformed this desolate, gloomy Hollow Zero into this? Who planted such a strong heart in this pale soil?
flavor.3: "So you've come such a long way on this circle..."
